name: Charming Vineyard Chateau of Bordeaux
description:
DESCRIPTION
Share the emotion by celebrating your reception in the intimacy of this charming Chateau in amongst the Bordeaux vines. A breathtaking place, arriving on the estate you will be captivated by the magic of the winding palm lined road leading to the beautiful 19th century building with its fountain park.
Recently acquired by a family of Bordeaux winegrowers who have successfully combined respect for tradition with the introduction of modern facilities, this site has become the biggest events venue on the outskirts of Bordeaux. This chateau has the largest reception areas within the area, just 10 minutes from downtown Bordeaux. The Chateau has so much character and will take you and your guests into a world of charm with 33 hectares of vineyards it is a beautiful setting for your wedding. Live the experience to make your event a unique and exceptional moment. Our team is attentive to you and your requirements and present you the diversity of our tailor-made offers.
The main reception room used for wedding was built in the 19th century. It was a former horse barn that has now been renovated in 1982 and converted into a function room. Leading directly to the 1,580 m² park with its fountain, the stone walls of this 250 m² room give it a warm, authentic feel. Unobstructed views over the 375 m² Fleur du Val barrel cellar also create a stunning feature point. It can cater for 325 people for cocktails, 200 people seated and 150 seated with dance floor.
 Capacity ranging from 10 to 1,300 guests.
 2 prestige salons in the Château, offering 34 m² and 39 m².
 3 function rooms: 250 m², 750 m² and the 800 m² barrel cellar.
 Château grounds of 1,580 m² with fountain, for cocktails, exhibitions and events.
 6,000 m² modular reception areas to host all types of events.
If you love your wine then as a little something extra you can visit the cellars and initiate your taste buds with some wine tasting with the Château’s bilingual oenologist: Discover the art of blending grape varieties and the stages in tasting. Express what your taste buds are experiencing using the right vocabulary and enjoy this experience with your family and friends.
Adjoining the Château there is gite with 3 bedrooms with the potential for 6 guests to stay (1 double, 2 singles and another 2 singles on a mezzanine) which is 250 euros per night. There is also a bathroom with separate WC and all linen is included. The cottage is located in the countryside and natural park with beautiful panoramic views onto the vineyard. The accommodation is nestled among the rows of vines grown on the organic farm, creating a bucolic and peaceful environment not far from the reception rooms. Enjoy this haven of peace and relaxing activities made available to recharge your batteries during your event. There is also a fully equipped kitchen (fridge, microwave oven, dishwasher, washing machine) and breakfast is available on request. Wifi and TV TNT is available in the gite also.
Reserved for residents there is a Pétanque pitch, tennis court, vegetable garden, indoor swimming pool and pedestrian circuit for those lovely walks where you can enjoy the scenery and the wildlife.
If this sounds like your dream French wedding venue then pleas do get in touch and we will be able to answer any further questions.
Nearest Airport: Bordeaux (10km)
*Privatisation of the venue is also an option (please ask when contact)
